articles.author: Steve Holland
articles.title: In Maui, Biden sees 'long road' ahead in recovering from deadly wildfires - Reuters
articles.description: U.S. President Joe Biden on Monday praised the "remarkable resiliency" of the people of Maui, after wildfires killed more than 114 people on the Hawaiian island two weeks ago, and said America would stand by them for as long as it takes.

articles.title: Workers now demanding nearly $80K to start new job - Fox Business
articles.description: A New York Federal Reserve survey published Monday found the minimum acceptable salary that American workers will take to switch jobs is at a record high.
articles.content:
The lowest wage that American workers are willing to take in order to accept a new job hit a record high this year, according to a Federal Reserve Bank of New York survey published Monday.
